widget.type: NEW INTERNS  |  NEW FULL TIME EMPLOYEES
widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

config.title: Jose Soto
config.description: Hello everyone! My name is Jose Soto, and I'm very excited to start working at Justia. I love to talk about sports, movies, series, and videogames. I'm a huge fan of RPGs such as Persona, Shin Megami Tensei, Yakuza, and FIFA.

config: If you want a match, just send me a message through Slack! I also like sci-fi and fantasy movies, but the ones I love the most are superhero films. I'm very excited to be a part of this company!
